title: Nancy Drew - Message In A Haunted Mansion
description:
<a href="http://www.herinteractive.com/Mystery_Games/Nancy_Drew/Message_in_a_Haunted_Mansion/pc" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.herinteractive.com/Mystery_Games/Nancy_Drew/Message_in_a_Haunted_Mansion/pc</a>

Heck, why not? Out of the fist 5 installments of the Nancy Drew series, only 3rd title has been missing. So here we go.

How to install
1. Burn or mount disk image
2. Locate CD-Rom drive's root directory then execute SETUP.exe
3. Choose any destination folders other than default (C:Nancy Drew...)
4. Skip DirectX setup (in most cases)

Enjoy the game!
